author: AFP
title: Record virus deaths in Spain as world hunkers down for long haul
description: A deluge of patients are overwhelming hospitals in Europe and the United States, now the focal points of a pandemic that is upending the global economy in unprecedented ways.
content:
MADRID: 
Spain reported a national daily 
record of 838 coronavirusdeaths on Sunday 
in a fresh warning to the 
world that 
long-term lockdowns may be needed to halt the deadly march of a disease that has claimed more than 31,000 lives.
